A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't believe the haters. Yes\, are there some things you'll shake your head at a bit in this film. But then\, 5 seconds later\, you're rolling with them. There's an occasional clunker in the jokes. But seriously\, this is a huge\, sweeping story. Twists\, turns\, awesome battle scenes\, heroes\, villains\, conflict.  It's easily in the top two of all the films\, neck and neck with the other great 2nd of 3\, ESB. And yes\, I'm old. I've seen these all\, lots of times\, all the way back to the originals of my childhood. Just go see this. The audience score of 55% is nonsense. That's the bots talking\, trying to let some juvenile punks screw it up for everyone. This film is awesome\, and you need to see it on a big screen\, not on your TV once you realize you missed it.
